allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive Admin Tools section with role-based access control

Features:
- Access Provisioning: Complete user management with CRUD operations, role assignment, and status toggling
- Reports: User activity dashboard with metrics, last login tracking, role distribution, and Excel export
- Data Management: Database reset and multi-step import wizard for bulk data loading from Excel/CSV
- Data Lookup: Reference guide showing all entity IDs and foreign key relationships for manual imports
- Data Model: Complete schema documentation with field definitions, relationships, and architecture overview

Backend:
- User management API endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- Admin-only database reset endpoint with transaction support
- Role-based authorization middleware
- Password reset utility script

Frontend:
- ProtectedRoute component for role-based route access
- Admin menu section with conditional rendering based on user role
- Five comprehensive admin pages with Material-UI components
- Integration with existing authentication system

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement fully functional notifications system

Features:
- Real-time notification popover in header with unread badge count
- Mark individual notifications as read with single click
- Mark all notifications as read with one action
- Notification types with color-coded icons (info, success, warning, error)
- Smart timestamp formatting (Just now, 5m ago, 2h ago, etc.)
- Notifications automatically refresh after marking as read

Backend:
- Notification model with Sequelize (id, userId, type, title, message, isRead, timestamps)
- Notification controller with CRUD operations and mark as read functionality
- Notification routes with authentication middleware (GET, PUT endpoints)
- Database associations (User hasMany Notifications)
- Notification seeder with 7 sample notifications

Frontend:
- Interactive notification menu with Material-UI components
- Unread/read visual distinction (background highlighting)
- Click-to-mark-read functionality for unread notifications
- Empty state handling ("No notifications" message)
- React Router v7 future flags to suppress deprecation warnings

Fixed:
- Sequelize model shadowing issue (changed from public! to declare)
- React Router deprecation warnings (added v7_startTransition and v7_relativeSplatPath flags)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Portfolio to Segment Function refactoring and fix routing

Changes:
- Deleted old Portfolio model, controller, and routes files
- Dropped Portfolios table from database (now using SegmentFunctions)
- Updated all frontend routing from /portfolio to /segment-function
- Fixed PortfolioProjects component to use segment-functions API
- Updated DomainsList navigation to segment-functions route
- Updated SegmentFunctionList navigation to new project routes
- Updated App.tsx routing: /portfolio/:portfolioId/projects -> /segment-function/:segmentFunctionId/projects
- Simplified domain cards with unified blue (#1e40af) and grey (#f3f4f6) color scheme

API Endpoints:
- All endpoints now use /segment-functions instead of /portfolios
- Projects include segmentFunctionData associations
- Resources load correctly with segmentFunction associations

Fixed Errors:
- Resolved "Portfolio is not associated to Resource" errors
- Fixed 500 errors on /api/v1/projects and /api/v1/resources endpoints
- Backend restarted to clear cached Sequelize associations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
